div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

span.p: Radnor Township School District is continuing operations and providing online instruction during the closure caused by the coronavirus pandemic. This reorganized Extended Closure webpage is meant to provide comprehensive and accessible information to district families.

Please note the additional webpages to the left or click here for Extended Closure FAQs; click here for messages from the Superintendent and district; click here for information on Schoology and Big Blue Button (BBB) live video conferencing; click here for special education; click here for community supports; and click here for ways you can help.

span.p: We miss seeing our students and staff! Email your photos and videos of learning and teaching from home to radnor@rtsd.org for a chance to be featured on our website and social media!
